00030     class TrackFilter {
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             TrackFilter() {
00035             }
00036 
00037             virtual ~TrackFilter() {
00038             }
00039 
00044             virtual bool passes(const G4Track*) = 0;
00045 
00051             static bool filter(const std::vector<TrackFilter*> filters, const G4Track* aTrack) {
00052                 bool save = false;
00053                 for (auto filter : filters) {
00054                     save = filter->passes(aTrack);
00055                     if (!save) {
00056                         break;
00057                     }
00058                 }
00059                 return save;
00060             }
00061 
00067             virtual std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00068                 return os;
00069             }
00070     };
00071 
00076     class TrackFilterChain {
00077 
00078         public:
00079 
00080             TrackFilterChain(std::string name) : name_(name) {
00081             }
00082 
00083             virtual ~TrackFilterChain() {
00084                 for (auto filter : filters_) {
00085                     delete filter;
00086                 }
00087                 filters_.clear();
00088             }
00089 
00096             bool process(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00097                 return TrackFilter::filter(filters_, aTrack);
00098             }
00099 
00106             static bool process(const G4Track* aTrack, const std::vector<TrackFilterChain*>& filters) {
00107                 bool save = false;
00108                 for (auto filterChain : filters) {
00109                     save = filterChain->process(aTrack);
00110                     if (save) {
00111                         break;
00112                     }
00113                 }
00114                 return save;
00115             }
00116 
00121             void addFilter(TrackFilter* filter) {
00122                 filters_.push_back(filter);
00123             }
00124 
00129             void setName(std::string name) {
00130                 name_ = name;
00131             }
00132 
00137             const std::string& getName() {
00138                 return name_;
00139             }
00140 
00141             const std::vector<TrackFilter*> getFilters() {
00142                 return filters_;
00143             }
00144 
00145         private:
00146 
00147             std::string name_;
00148             std::vector<TrackFilter*> filters_;
00149     };

00155     class TrackPassFilter : public TrackFilter {
00156 
00157         public:
00158 
00159             virtual bool passes(const G4Track*) {
00160                 return true;
00161             }
00162 
00163             virtual std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00164                 os << "pass";
00165                 return os;
00166             }
00167     };

00173     class TrackEnergyFilter : public TrackFilter {
00174 
00175         public:
00176 
00177             TrackEnergyFilter(double threshold) : threshold_(threshold) {
00178             }
00179 
00180             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00181                 return (aTrack->GetVertexKineticEnergy()) > threshold_;
00182             }
00183 
00184             void setThreshold(double threshold) {
00185                 threshold_ = threshold;
00186             }
00187 
00188             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00189                 os << "KE > " << (threshold_ / MeV) << " MeV";
00190                 return os;
00191             }
00192 
00193         private:
00194 
00195             double threshold_{0.};
00196     };

00202     class TrackPDGCodeFilter : public TrackFilter {
00203 
00204         public:
00205 
00206             TrackPDGCodeFilter() {
00207             }
00208 
00209             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00210                 if (pdgids_.size()) {
00211                     return pdgids_.find(aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetPDGcode()) != pdgids_.end();
00212                 } else {
00213                     return true;
00214                 }
00215             }
00216 
00217             void addPDGCode(int pdgid) {
00218                 pdgids_.insert(pdgid);
00219             }
00220 
00221             void addParticle(std::string particleName) {
00222                 G4ParticleDefinition* particleDef = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable()->FindParticle(particleName);
00223                 if (particleDef) {
00224                     pdgids_.insert(particleDef->GetPDGEncoding());
00225                 } else {
00226                     G4Exception("", "", FatalException, std::string("Unknown particle name: " + particleName).c_str());
00227                 }
00228             }
00229 
00230             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00231                 os << "PDG Codes:";
00232                 for (int pdgid : pdgids_) {
00233                     os << " " << pdgid;
00234                 }
00235                 return os;
00236             }
00237 
00238 
00239         private:
00240 
00241             std::unordered_set<int> pdgids_;
00242     };

00248     class TrackProcessFilter : public TrackFilter {
00249 
00250         public:
00251 
00252             TrackProcessFilter() {
00253             }
00254 
00255             virtual bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00256                 const G4VProcess* process = aTrack->GetCreatorProcess();
00257                 if (process) {
00258                     for (const auto& processName : processNames_) {
00259                         if (exactMatch_[processName]) {
00260                             if (!processName.compare(process->GetProcessName())) {
00261                                 return true;
00262                             }
00263                         } else {
00264                             if (process->GetProcessName().find(processName) != std::string::npos) {
00265                                 return true;
00266                             }
00267                         }
00268                     }
00269                 }
00270                 return false;
00271             }
00272 
00273             void addProcess(std::string processName, bool exactMatch) {
00274                 processNames_.push_back(processName);
00275                 exactMatch_[processName] = exactMatch;
00276             }
00277 
00278             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00279                 os << "processes:";
00280                 for (auto processName : processNames_) {
00281                     os << " " << processName;
00282                 }
00283                 return os;
00284             }
00285 
00286         protected:
00287 
00289             std::vector<std::string> processNames_;
00290 
00292             std::map<std::string, bool> exactMatch_;
00293 
00294     };
00295 
00300     class TrackParentProcessFilter : public TrackProcessFilter {
00301 
00302         public:
00303 
00304             TrackParentProcessFilter() {
00305             }
00306 
00307             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00308                 static G4TrackingManager* mgr = G4RunManagerKernel::GetRunManagerKernel()->GetTrackingManager();
00309                 if (aTrack != mgr->GetTrack()) {
00310                     return false;
00311                 }
00312                 G4TrackVector* tracks = mgr->GimmeSecondaries();
00313                 for (auto track : *tracks) {
00314                     const G4VProcess* process = track->GetCreatorProcess();
00315                     if (process) {
00316                         for (const auto& processName : processNames_) {
00317                             if (exactMatch_[processName]) {
00318                                 if (!processName.compare(process->GetProcessName())) {
00319                                     return true;
00320                                 }
00321                             } else {
00322                                 if (process->GetProcessName().find(processName) != std::string::npos) {
00323                                     return true;
00324                                 }
00325                             }
00326                         }
00327                     }
00328                 }
00329                 return false;
00330             }
00331 
00332             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00333                 os << "daughter processes:";
00334                 for (auto processName : processNames_) {
00335                     os << " " << processName;
00336                 }
00337                 return os;
00338             }
00339     };
00340 
00345     class TrackRegionFilter : public TrackFilter {
00346 
00347         public:
00348 
00349             TrackRegionFilter() {
00350             }
00351 
00352             void addRegion(std::string regionName, bool regionSave) {
00353                 regions_.insert(regionName);
00354                 regionSave_[regionName] = regionSave;
00355             }
00356 
00357             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00358                 G4Region* region = aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex()->GetRegion();
00359                 if (regions_.find(region->GetName()) != regions_.end()) {
00360                     return regionSave_[region->GetName()];
00361                 } else {
00362                     return false;
00363                 }
00364             }
00365 
00366             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00367                 os << "regions:";
00368                 for (auto region : regions_) {
00369                     os << " " << region;
00370                 }
00371                 return os;
00372             }
00373 
00374         private:
00375 
00376             std::unordered_set<std::string> regions_;
00377             std::map<std::string, bool> regionSave_;
00378     };
00379 
00384     class TrackVolumeFilter : public TrackFilter {
00385 
00386         public:
00387 
00388             TrackVolumeFilter() {
00389             }
00390 
00391             void addVolume(std::string volumeName, bool volumeSave) {
00392                 volumes_.insert(volumeName);
00393                 volumeSave_[volumeName] = volumeSave;
00394             }
00395 
00396             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00397                 const G4LogicalVolume* vol = aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex();
00398                 if (volumes_.find(vol->GetName()) != volumes_.end()) {
00399                     return volumeSave_[vol->GetName()];
00400                 } else {
00401                     return false;
00402                 }
00403             }
00404 
00405             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) {
00406                 os << "volumes:";
00407                 for (auto volume : volumes_) {
00408                     os << " " << volume;
00409                 }
00410                 return os;
00411             }
00412 
00413         private:
00414 
00415             std::unordered_set<std::string> volumes_;
00416             std::map<std::string, bool> volumeSave_;
00417     };

00423     class TrackIDFilter : public TrackFilter {
00424 
00425         public:
00426 
00427             TrackIDFilter() {
00428             }
00429 
00430             void addTrackID(int trackID) {
00431                 trackIDs_.insert(trackID);
00432             }
00433 
00434             bool passes(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00435                 return trackIDs_.find(aTrack->GetTrackID()) != trackIDs_.end();
00436             }
00437 
00438         private:
00439 
00440             std::unordered_set<int> trackIDs_;
00441     };
